div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 15:55 pm CDT

div.div: Increasing clouds, with a low around 50. North northwest wind 5 to 15 mph becoming northeast after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.
Mostly cloudy, with a high near 73. Calm wind becoming east around 5 mph in the afternoon.
Patchy fog after 1am. Otherwise, mostly clear, with a low around 56. East southeast wind around 5 mph.
